Class CustomerService

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.CustomerService
public class CustomerService extends Object
Service class that orchestrates operations for Gym Customers. Acts as a facade, delegating to specialized services like GymService, SlotService, BookingService, and WaitlistService.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

    Instantiates a new customer service.

      public List<GymCenter> viewGymsInCity(String city)
      Retrieves all approved gym centers in a specific city.
      Parameters:
      city - the name of the city
      Returns:
      a list of approved gym centers

    • viewAllGyms

      public List<GymCenter> viewAllGyms()
      Retrieves all approved gym centers in the entire system.
      Returns:
      a list of approved gym centers

    • getGymCenterDetails

      public GymCenter getGymCenterDetails(int centerId)
      Retrieves details of a specific gym center by its ID, provided it is approved.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the unique ID of the gym center
      Returns:
      the GymCenter object, or null if not found or not approved

    • searchGymsByName

      public List<GymCenter> searchGymsByName(String searchTerm)
      Searches for approved gym centers whose names contain the given search term (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - the term to search for
      Returns:
      a list of matching gym centers

    • viewSlotsForGym

      public List<Slot> viewSlotsForGym(int centerId)
      Retrieves all available time slots for a specific gym center.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the unique ID of the gym center
      Returns:
      a list of slots for the gym

    • viewAvailableSlotsForGym

      public List<Slot> viewAvailableSlotsForGym(int centerId)
      Retrieves only those slots for a specific gym center that have at least one available seat.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the unique ID of the gym center
      Returns:
      a list of available slots

    • getSlotDetails

      public Slot getSlotDetails(int slotId)
      Retrieves details of a specific slot by its ID.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the unique ID of the slot
      Returns:
      the Slot object

    • bookSlot

      public int bookSlot(int userId, int slotId) throws UserNotFoundException, SlotNotAvailableException
      Attempts to book a slot for a customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the customer booking the slot
      slotId - the ID of the slot to book
      Returns:
      the booking ID if successful, -1 if added to waitlist, or 0 if booking failed
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user ID does not exist in the system
      SlotNotAvailableException - if the slot is full and waitlist is also full

    • cancelBooking

      public boolean cancelBooking(int userId, int bookingId) throws BookingNotDoneException
      Cancel booking.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      bookingId - the booking ID
      Returns:
      true, if successful
      Throws:
      BookingNotDoneException - the booking not done exception

    • viewMyBookings

      public List<Booking> viewMyBookings(int userId)
      Retrieves all bookings (confirmed and cancelled) for the customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique ID of the customer
      Returns:
      a list of all bookings

    • viewMyActiveBookings

      public List<Booking> viewMyActiveBookings(int userId)
      Retrieves only the confirmed/active bookings for the customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique ID of the customer
      Returns:
      a list of active bookings

    • viewMyBookingHistory

      public List<Booking> viewMyBookingHistory(int userId)
      Retrieves the booking history for the customer, including completed and cancelled bookings.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique ID of the customer
      Returns:
      a list of historical bookings

    • viewMyWaitlistStatus

      public List<Waitlist> viewMyWaitlistStatus(int userId)

      Parameters:
      userId - the unique ID of the customer
      Returns:
      a list of waitlist entries

    • getMyWaitlistPosition

      public int getMyWaitlistPosition(int userId, int slotId)
      Gets the customer's priority position in the waitlist for a specific slot.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique ID of the customer
      slotId - the unique ID of the slot
      Returns:
      the position (1-based), or -1 if not found

    • removeFromWaitlist

      public boolean removeFromWaitlist(int userId, int waitlistId)
      Removes the customer from a waitlist.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique ID of the customer
      waitlistId - the ID of the waitlist entry
      Returns:
      true if removal was successful

    • updateMyProfile

      public boolean updateMyProfile(User user) throws UserNotFoundException
      Updates the customer's profile information.
      Parameters:
      user - the GymCustomer object with updated details
      Returns:
      true if update was successful
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if user doesn't exist

    • changeMyPassword

      public boolean changeMyPassword(int userId, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws UserNotFoundException
      Changes the customer's password.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique ID of the customer
      oldPassword - the current raw password
      newPassword - the new raw password
      Returns:
      true if password change was successful
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if user doesn't exist

    • getMyStatistics

      public Map<String,Integer> getMyStatistics(int userId)
      Calculates and returns various booking and waitlist statistics for the customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique ID of the customer
      Returns:
      a map containing statistic categories and their counts
